name: Lavender
description: Lavender essential oil is known for its calming and relaxing properties. It is commonly used to help reduce stress and anxiety, promote restful sleep, and soothe skin irritations.

name: Peppermint
description: Peppermint essential oil is invigorating and energizing. It can be used to help alleviate headaches, relieve muscle tension, and promote healthy digestion.

name: Tea Tree
description: Tea tree essential oil has powerful antimicrobial properties and is commonly used to help treat skin conditions such as acne, eczema, and fungal infections.

name: Eucalyptus
description: Eucalyptus essential oil is refreshing and revitalizing. It is often used to help clear congestion, promote respiratory health, and relieve muscle soreness.

name: Frankincense
description: Frankincense essential oil is known for its grounding and calming properties. It is commonly used to help reduce stress and promote relaxation, as well as support healthy skin.
